resources.string: Warning: this account is blocked\nand needs to be reactivated.
You\'ve been successfully logged in as %s to %s
Your account is ready to be used
Remember your PIN, it cannot be changed!
Note: your PIN has not been verified yet.
If you can\'t login with the credentials above, scan\nagain and enter the correct PIN code.
You have no identities yet.\n\nPress the menu button to add an identity.
Are you sure you want to log in?
You will be logged in as:
Do you want to activate the following account?
You will enrol to the following domain:
You logged in with the following account
Please choose a PIN to secure this identity.
The entered PINs don\'t match. Try again.\nChoose a PIN you can remember.
Place a QR code inside the rectangle to scan it.
Are you sure you want to log in?
You will be logged in as:
Don\'t worry! Click the QR code on the\nwebsite. You will be asked to enter the\nfollowing one-time credentials:
Unknown identity provider, please enrol first.
Unknown identity for service, please enroll first.
No identities found for identity provider, please enrol first.
Unable to log in. Invalid key.
Unable to log in. Invalid challenge.
An unknown error occurred. Please contact support.
Invalid authentication request. Please contact support.
Invalid authentication response. Wrong PIN code? Try again.
You tried to log in with an invalid or unknown account. Please (re-)activate your account first.
This account can no longer be used.
This account has been blocked temprorarily.
This account has been blocked for %d minutes.
The scanned QR code is invalid or has expired. Please try again.
The server doesn\'t recognize the login request. Please contact support.
You supplied an incorrect PIN. Please enter your PIN again. Check the verification icon for the last digit.
You supplied an incorrect PIN. You have %d attempts left. Please enter your PIN again. Check the verification icon for the last digit.
You have one last attempt left. If you enter an incorrect PIN again all the accounts on this device will be blocked.
The server is incompatible with this version of tiqr.
Do you want to activate\n the following account?
You\'ve been successfully enrolled as %s for %s
Cannot connect to enrolment server. Please contact the website administrator.
Invalid enrolment server response. Please contact the website administrator.
Cannot download service logo. Please contact the website administrator.
You already enrolled with the identity %s for the service %s.
Failed to store identity provider. Please contact support.
Failed to store identity. Please contact support.
Failed to generate identity secret. Please contact support.
Device is not compatible with required security standards.

Using tiqr you can use your smartphone to easily and securely log in to several websites.
The application does not yet have an active account. You need an active account to use tiqr. You can find a list of identity providers at tiqr.org.
After registering, you will receive an activation code and instructions for activating your account. During the activation process you will need to scan a QR code. Press Scan if asked.

Go to the website you want to log in to and follow these steps:
Scan the QR code on the login screen of the website or service.
If you have multiple identities, select your identity.
Confirm your identity (you will have to enter your PIN).
You are logged in! Press Scan to start the login process.

Now what?
Ask your identity provider(s) for a new activation code. For a link to your identity provider(s) check your identities (accessible from the top right).
Together with your new activation code you will receive instructions for reactivating your account. Press Scan if asked.
